data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 23012, Version Hash: fa2ef18a6aebe7620cedfc5bb14fea57067e1def
data.actual_result: Discord goes from the name changing to 'No Game Detected'
data.expected_result: It's supposed to change the game name shown (Media Monkey) to whatever you change it to.
data.short_description: When changing the game name while using MediaMonkey as the program, Discord loses detection of MediaMonkey
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord & Media Monkey - Add Media Monkey as the game you're currently playing - Change the name of the game you're currently playing (Media Monkey to whatever) in Discord - Discord loses detection of Media Monkey until you click back on the Media Monkey program itself
